DOC.criteria: Male Age ≥ 21 Histologically proven prostate adenocarcinoma Clinical stage T1bT2b , N0Nx , M0Mx ( AJCC 6th Edition ) PSA ≤ 20 ng/ml Prostate volume ≤ 100 cc Patients belong one follow risk group : Low : CS T1bT2a Gleason 26 PSA ≤ 10 Intermediate : CS T2b Gleason 26 PSA ≤ 10 , OR CS T1bT2b , Gleason 26 PSA ≤ 20 ng/ml OR Gleason 7 PSA ≤ 10 ng/ml Any histology adenocarcinoma Age < 21 KPS < = 40 < 70 ECOG Performance Status ≥ 2 Patient weight > 350 lb .
